sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-button type="primary" @click="add(props)">添加</el-button>
  <el-table
    v-for="shuju in tbData.children" :key="shuju"
  >
    <el-table-column prop="departmentId" label="科室ID" width="150" >{{shuju.departmentId}}</el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="departmentName" label="科室" width="150" >{{shuju.departmentName}}</el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>
<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      currentPage: 1, //默认页码为1
      pagesize: 10, //默认一页显示10条
      dialogVisible: false,
      dialogVisible1: false,
      info: {}, //修改数据
      info1: {}, //新增数据
      tbData: []
    }
  },
  //初始化工作
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {

    del(data) {
      console.log(data.row.departmentId)
      get('/deleteDepartment', { departmentId: data.row.departmentId }).then(
        (res) => {
          ElMessage({
            message: '删除成功！',
            type: 'success'
          })
        }
      )
      window.location.reload() //刷新
    },
    edit() {
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible //马上消失
      //作用是调整下createTime的格式
      var dt = new Date(this.info.createTime)
      let year = dt.getFullYear()
      let month = dt.getMonth() + 1
      let date = dt.getDate()
      this.info.createTime = year + '/' + month + '/' + date
      get('/updateDepartment', this.info).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '修改成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    },
    add() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
    },
    insert() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
      get('/addDepartment', this.info1).then((res) => {
        console.log(res)
        if (res.data == 1) {
          ElMessage({
            message: '添加成功',
            type: 'success'
          })
          // 刷新
          window.location.reload()
        } else {
          ElMessage({
            message: '添加失败',
            type: 'danger'
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>
